OOC: Please keep in mind Saberback was not identified by the Maximals,
they=
 have no idea who that was on the field. They should have no idea
how he wa=
s controlling the Dinosaurs or the limitations of that
control.

from the CR chamb=
er, to an explanation of what's happening, to a
transfer of their sparks, t=
o the completion of it and his
transforming. You could have stretched that =

e all your characters

> <OLD - Tuscon, Straight Shot, Quickstride, Rodimus, Silver Dr=
agon>

n.  Better

the Silver Dragon,

ars his assertive

As the other approach RODIMUS is still standing there holding t=
he
rather large draconic scale looking at it admiringly.


. . . .

RODIMUS=
, LEO and WING SABER are all standing in surprise as TUSCON
took on this ne=
w form, and how he explained how it all came from a
dream.

WING SABER whis=
pered, "I didn't know that Yokitron had such powers to
do anything like thi=
s."

LEO shook his head thoughtfully, "I am not sure if he does."

RODIMUS =
came over to stand next to LEO and WING SABER as he held the
large scale un=
der one arm. He looked up at this new version of TUSCON
asking the question=
 that was probably on the minds of the others.

"So what now? What does thi=
s new form mean?"
